answers.answer: Hi DearYou might probably have nerve irritation due to sciatic nerve pathology.The spinal nerve irritation could typically give rise to such kind of symptoms.Also, check your diabetics status (if any) as chronic diabetes can also lead to such kind of neuropathic symptoms.Consult your physician for further evaluationBest
